trans-unit.source: Exposes methods and properties to support UI Automation client access to controls that act as containers for a collection of child elements.
trans-unit.target: Viser metodene og egenskapene som støtter automatisering av Brukergrensesnittet klienttilgang til kontroller som brukes som beholdere for en samling av underordnede elementer.

trans-unit.source: The children of this element must implement <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IGridItemProvider"></xref> and be organized in a two-dimensional logical coordinate system that can be traversed (that is, a UI Automation client can move to adjacent controls) by using the keyboard.
trans-unit.target: Underordnede til dette elementet må implementere <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IGridItemProvider"> </xref> og ordnes i et todimensjonal logiske koordinatsystem kan traversert (det vil si en Brukergrensesnittet Automation-klient kan flytte tilstøtende kontroller) ved hjelp av tastaturet.

trans-unit.source: Implemented on a UI Automation provider that must support the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridPattern> control pattern.
trans-unit.target: Implementert på en Brukergrensesnittet Automation leverandør må støtte av <xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridPattern>kontrollen mønsteret.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridPattern>

trans-unit.source: IGridProvider does not enable active manipulation of a grid; <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ITransformProvider> must be implemented to enable this functionality.
trans-unit.target: IGridProvider aktivere ikke active manipulering av et rutenett. <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ITransformProvider>må implementeres for å aktivere denne funksjonen.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ITransformProvider>

trans-unit.source: Gets the total number of columns in a grid.
trans-unit.target: Henter antall kolonner i et rutenett.

trans-unit.source: Hidden rows and columns, depending on the provider implementation, can be loaded in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] tree and will therefore be reflected in the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridPattern.GridPatternInformation.RowCount%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridPattern.GridPatternInformation.ColumnCount%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Skjulte rader og kolonner, avhengig av implementeringen leverandøren kan lastes inn i den [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] tre og vil derfor gjenspeiles i den <xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridPattern.GridPatternInformation.RowCount%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridPattern.GridPatternInformation.ColumnCount%2A>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridPattern.GridPatternInformation.ColumnCount%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridPattern.GridPatternInformation.RowCount%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the hidden rows and columns have not yet been loaded they will not be counted.
trans-unit.target: Hvis skjulte rader og kolonner ikke er lastet er de ikke talt.

trans-unit.source: The total number of columns in a grid.
trans-unit.target: Totalt antall kolonner i et rutenett.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the UI Automation provider for the specified cell.
trans-unit.target: Henter Brukergrensesnittet Automation-leverandøren for den angitte cellen.

trans-unit.source: - Grid coordinates are zero-based with the upper left (or upper right cell depending on locale) having coordinates (0,0).
trans-unit.target: -Rutenett koordinatene er nullbasert med øvre venstre (eller cellen øverst til høyre avhengig nasjonal innstilling) med koordinater (0,0).

trans-unit.source: - If a cell is empty a UI Automation provider must still be returned in order to support the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IGridItemProvider.ContainingGrid%2A> property for that cell.
trans-unit.target: -Hvis en celle er tom Brukergrensesnittet Automation leverandør fremdeles må returneres for at den <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IGridItemProvider.ContainingGrid%2A>egenskapen for denne cellen.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IGridItemProvider.ContainingGrid%2A>

trans-unit.source: This is possible when the layout of child elements in the grid is similar to a ragged array.
trans-unit.target: Dette er mulige når oppsettet for underordnede elementer i rutenettet ligner en uregelmessige matrise.

trans-unit.source: ![Windows Explorer view showing ragged layout.](~/add/media/uia-gridpattern-ragged-array.PNG "Windows Explorer view showing ragged layout.")
trans-unit.target: ![Windows Utforsker Vis viser uregelmessige oppsett. ] (~/add/media/uia-gridpattern-ragged-array.PNG "Windows Utforsker visningen viser uregelmessige oppsett.")

trans-unit.source: Example of a Grid Control with Empty Coordinates - Hidden rows and columns, depending on the provider implementation, can be loaded in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] tree and will therefore be reflected in the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IGridProvider.RowCount%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IGridProvider.ColumnCount%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Eksempel på en rutenettkontrollen med tom koordinatene - skjulte rader og kolonner, avhengig av implementeringen leverandøren kan lastes inn i den [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] tre og vil derfor gjenspeiles i den <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IGridProvider.RowCount%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IGridProvider.ColumnCount%2A>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IGridProvider.ColumnCount%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IGridProvider.RowCount%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the hidden rows and columns have not yet been loaded they should not be counted.
trans-unit.target: Hvis skjulte rader og kolonner ikke er lastet skal de telles ikke.

trans-unit.source: The ordinal number of the row of interest.
trans-unit.target: Ordenstallet radverdiene interessante.

trans-unit.source: The ordinal number of the column of interest.
trans-unit.target: Ordenstallet antall kolonner av interesse.

trans-unit.source: The UI Automation provider for the specified cell.
trans-unit.target: Automation UI-leverandør for den angitte cellen.

trans-unit.source: Gets the total number of rows in a grid.
trans-unit.target: Henter antall rader i et rutenett.

trans-unit.source: Hidden rows and columns, depending on the provider implementation, can be loaded in the logical tree and will therefore be reflected in the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridPattern.GridPatternInformation.RowCount%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridPattern.GridPatternInformation.ColumnCount%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Skjulte rader og kolonner, avhengig av leverandøren-implementering kan ikke lastes inn i det logiske treet derfor gjenspeiles i den <xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridPattern.GridPatternInformation.RowCount%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridPattern.GridPatternInformation.ColumnCount%2A>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridPattern.GridPatternInformation.ColumnCount%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridPattern.GridPatternInformation.RowCount%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the hidden rows and columns have not yet been loaded they will not be counted.
trans-unit.target: Hvis skjulte rader og kolonner ikke er lastet er de ikke talt.

trans-unit.source: The total number of rows in a grid.
trans-unit.target: Totalt antall rader i et rutenett.
